story: You come across a heavily guarded room filled with advanced technology and equipment. What do you do?

actions.good: Using your stealth skills, you manage to slip past the guards without being noticed. In the quiet of the night, you gather whatever equipment strikes your fancy and make a quick escape.
actions.bad: As you attempt to sneak into the room, you bump into one of the guards. Alarms blare as they come pouring in, dealing damage to you as you try to flee.

actions.action: Bust down the door with force
actions.good: With a mighty burst of strength, you smash through the door and take whatever equipment is lying around. Your brute force pays off.
actions.bad: Your impulsive decision to break in results in heavy resistance from the guards, leaving you battered and bruised while they recover their stolen gear.

actions.action: Hack into the room's security system
actions.good: Using your tech skills, you bypass the room's security and gather whatever equipment catches your eye. Your hacking prowess proves successful.
actions.bad: As you attempt to hack into the room's security system, an alarm goes off, alerting nearby guards. They quickly arrive on the scene, causing damage as they chase you out of the area.
